alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:43PM CDT until March 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN NOXUBEE AND KEMPER COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gholson, or near Preston, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Macon and Paulette around 800 PM CDT. Prairie Point around 805 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Shuqualak and Scooba. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
